# `bowen.biodiversity.webapp`

This repository contains the analysis code, some data, and documentation for the Spatial Conservation Prioritization work conducted for the Bowen Island Biodiversity Plan. 

Link to the Shiny Web Map Application: https://palenlab.shinyapps.io/Bowen-Biodiversity-WebApp/ 
Link to the documentation site: https://palen-lab.github.io/bowen.biodiversity.webapp/
